text:
@SenKamalaHarris Test today, pass....no Covid19 

3 weeks later you get the virus.

Explain the benefit of the test if it can change in the future.

I'll help with the explanation.
It's a Democrat talking point.
Pointing the finger without truly explaining why. PHONY!
